name: Budew
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Roselia from your hand onto Budew (this counts as evolving Budew) and remove all damage counters from Budew.

attacks.name: Errand-Running
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
